title: Dec in AD will cause inc in unemployment when

content.question: A reduction in aggregate demand will necessarily cause an increase in unemployment in the short run when

choices.label: nominal wages or prices are sticky downward
nominal wages and prices are flexible
the aggregate supply curve is vertical
the money supply grows at a constant rate

content.answer: nominal wages or prices are sticky downward
